name: Breach
description: You touch a surface and phase through a wall, barrier, or object that is less than 1 unit thick, not made of lead or enchanted with magic. If the wall does not meet these parameters, the portal does not open and you take 10 arcane damage. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, you take 12 arcane damage and become maddened.
charge: The breach lasts for 1 minute and allows other creatures to pass through. If you do not roll at least 2 successes, the portal instead is opened to a random area within the Perdition, the plane of chaos and whatever dangers lie there.
